about_the_game:
Bullet Hell Monday: Finale, Original Soundtrack.
Enjoy the music playing in the game.

Please note that some of the songs are also included in the "Bullet Hell Monday: Black OST." If you already have the "Bullet Hell Monday: Black OST," you can purchase the "Bullet Hell Monday: Finale OST Original Selection" to complete your collection of all songs without buying duplicates.
